content.rendered:
Whitewater rafting is a summer activity the whole family can enjoy. Who wouldn't want to enjoy majestic mountain views all while rafting down the river? With rafting trips across the state and for all levels and ages, there is a whitewater experience to be had for all. If you've ever thought about rafting but never quite took the plunge, or even contemplated ziplining, but never quite booked, now is the time. With Thanksgiving right around the corner, we all know Black Friday is soon to follow. 

 

In typical Black Friday fashion, AVA Rafting will be featuring a BOGO 50% deal. No matter your adventure of choice, rafting, ziplining, or maybe rafting and ziplining, when you buy one, you will get the other 50% off. If you never got out on the river last summer, or never got the chance to zipline at one of our two courses, now is the time to take the plunge and book. If you are unsure as to the dates you may want to embark on your adventure, do not worry. With our excellent cancellation policy and flexible date range, we will be sure to get you on the trip of your choice, but if you want this excellent special through our killer Black Friday deal, then book now to secure pricing.  

If you are sick of giving the same gift year after year, give an experience instead. Rafting and ziplining with family and friends is truly a memorable experience no one is soon to forget.
